feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.18.0
entry.content:
The Trips release

You can now create, edit and delete trips. To create a trip, click on the "New Trip" button on the Trips page. Provide a name, date and time for start and end of the trip. You can add your own notes to the trip as well.

If you have points tracked during provided timeframe, they will be automatically added to the trip and will be shown on the trip map.

Also, if you have Immich integrated, you will see photos from the trip on the trip page, along with a link to look at them on Immich.

Added

  • The Trips feature. Read above for more details.

Changed

  • Maps are now not so rough on the edges.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1e0ede99-6c8c-4a26-a2b2-2cf4e23c1002

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

What's Changed

  • Trips by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/450

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.17.2...0.18.0

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.18.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Fixed a bug where the trips interface was breaking when Immich integration is not configured.

Added

  • Flash messages are now being shown on the map when Immich integration is not configured.

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.18.0...0.18.1

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.18.2
entry.content:
Added

  • Demo account. You can now login with demo@dawarich.app / password to see how Dawarich works. This replaces previous default credentials.

Changed

  • The login page now shows demo account credentials if DEMO_ENV env var is set to true.

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.18.1...0.18.2

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.19.0
entry.content:
The Photoprism integration release

‚ö†Ô∏è This release introduces a breaking change. ‚ö†Ô∏è The GET /api/v1/photos endpoint now returns following structure of the response:

json [ { "id": "1", "latitude": 11.22, "longitude": 12.33, "localDateTime": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z", "originalFileName": "photo.jpg", "city": "Berlin", "state": "Berlin", "country": "Germany", "type": "image", // "image" or "video" "source": "photoprism" // "photoprism" or "immich" } ]

Added

  • Photos from Photoprism are now can be shown on the map. To enable this feature, you need to provide your Photoprism instance URL and API key in the Settings page. Then you need to enable "Photos" layer on the map (top right corner).
  • Geodata is now can be imported from Photoprism to Dawarich. The "Import Photoprism data" button on the Imports page will start the import process.

Fixed

  • z-index on maps so they won't overlay notifications dropdown
  • Redis connectivity where it's not required

üíô This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

What's Changed

  • Reset z-index on leaflet map by @poldixd in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/469
  • Avoid Redis connectivity on initialization by @alexbarcelo in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/473
  • Photoprism integration by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/475

New Contributors

  • @poldixd made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/469
  • @alexbarcelo made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/473

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.18.2...0.19.0

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.19.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Sidekiq is now being correctly exported to Prometheus with PROMETHEUS_EXPORTER_ENABLED=true env var in dawarich_sidekiq service.

üíô This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

What's Changed

  • Fix Prometheus exporter for Sidekiq by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/483

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.19.0...0.19.1
